description: Front-end developer. I'm passionate about building products that make a difference.
summary: I'm a passionate front-end developer with expertise in React, Next.js, and various other technologies. I started my programming journey in 2017 as a hobby, and it has since become my passion. Currently, I'm pursuing a degree in Computer Engineering while continuously expanding my knowledge.

projects.summary: I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are some of my favorites.

ifcalc.description: Developed a web application to help students calculate their grades and track their academic progress.

rabbit_hole.description: An user-friendly application that provides a comfy and practice way to watch your animes without a single ad by scraping them.
